title: Homeownership
alt: New research shows over 60% of the financial collapse's toxic assets were created by power drills.
transcript:
[Cueball is in an empty room, on the phone with a friend.]
Cueball: I've always rented, so this blows my mindâ€”this house is mine? I own a building?
Friend: Yup!Cueball: I could, like, decide to drill a hole in that wall there, and nobody could do anything about it?
Friend: That's right![Cueball, off the phone, stands in silence.]Ten hours later:
[Cueball is standing to the left a pile of rubble, on the phone with a friend.]
Cueball: Can I come stay with you? My house has a... problem.
Friend: Let me guess: you drilled holes in it until it collapsed?
Cueball: I don't think I'm cut out for homeownership.
